## ConfirmDialogService.open() method

Opens a confirmation dialog, forcing the user to take action before proceeding.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
open(config: ConfirmDialogConfig): MatDialogRef<ConfirmDialogComponent, boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  config | [ConfirmDialogConfig](./confirm-dialog.confirmdialogconfig.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

MatDialogRef&lt;ConfirmDialogComponent, boolean&gt;

A reference to an opened dialog.
